homosexuality.label: Homosexual activity
homosexuality.description: Consensual sexual activity between individuals of the same sex.

current_status.description: The only article that may apply to LGBT is Article 200 of the penal code which cites "serious sexual misconduct"

marriage.label: Same-sex marriage
marriage.description: Marriage and marriage recognition between two people of the same biological sex and/or gender identity.

changing-gender.label: Right to change legal gender
changing-gender.description: Legal recognition of sex reassignment by permitting a change of legal gender on an individual's birth certificate.

current_status.description: Filipinos who undergo gender re-assignment surgery are not permitted to change their legal gender per a supreme court ruling in 2007. Individuals with Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia (CAH), a very rare gender disorder, are permitted to change their gender

adoption.label: Same-sex adoption
adoption.description: The ability for same-sex couples to legally adopt a child.

discrimination.label: LGBT discrimination
discrimination.description: Prohibition of discrimination based on sexual orientation and/or gender identity.

current_status.description:
There are no nation-wide discrimination protections for LGBT people.

On October 17, 2012, Cebu City approved an anti-discrimination policy.

On September 25, 2014, Philippine province, Agusan del Norte, passed an anti-discrimination ordinance that protects people irrespective of their sexual orientation and gender identity and expression.

housing-discrimination.label: LGBT housing discrimination
housing-discrimination.description: Prohibition of discrimination based on sexual orientation and/or gender identity when applying for housing or discrimination by landlords / property owners.

employment-discrimination.label: LGBT employment discrimination
employment-discrimination.description: Prohibition of discrimination based on sexual orientation and/or gender identity in employment, including hiring, promotion, termination, harassment, etc.

military.label: Homosexuals serving openly in military
military.description: The ability for homosexuals to serve in the military and be open about their sexuality.

age-of-consent.label: Equal age of consent
age-of-consent.description: The difference between legal age of consent for homosexual sex and heterosexual sex.

blood.label: Blood donations by MSMs
blood.description: The ability for MSMs (men who have sex with men) to donate blood or tissue for organ transplants. A deferral period refers to a waiting time before a man can donate after having sex.

current_status.description: Men who have had sex with men are never allowed to donate blood.

conversion-therapy.label: Conversion therapy
conversion-therapy.description: Legal status of conducting sexual orientation changing therapy ("ex-gay" therapy)

current_status.description: the prime minister was promoting it.
